attributes.action: Extend The Opening Hours For Shops & Retail Outlets on a Sunday in NI!
attributes.background: We are one of the very few countries that are only allowed to sell from 1-6pm on a Sunday. The tourism in NI is growing rapidly and is already high enough to warrant extended hours around the country. This would contribute to the economy, create more jobs and enhance working hours for existing staff

rejection.details: Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for.
